title: Fragments Of Skirt, 1850–99
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: warp printed
provenance: Donor believes this to be from a dress of Mrs. Henry Clew's grandmother.
description: Two sections of a skirt, shaped and gored on white ribbed ground; warp pattern in pale rose, brown and pink festoons and small flower clusters.  Trimmed with flounces of white net with eyelet embroidery, gathered by a large bow of russet color ribbon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments Of Skirt, 1850–99. Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: warp printed. 1966-38-1-a,b.
